data.title: powered by Oasys Sports
data.text:
Do you offer lodging for these clinics/showcases?

A. No, lodging is not included but there are several hotels located near the Duke Campus where trainings are held. A few options are: The Washington Duke Inn (3001 Cameron Blvd, Durham, NC, 844-203-1599), The JB Duke Hotel (230 Science Drive, 919-660-6400), and The Millennium Hotel (2800 Campus Walk Ave, 833-449-1262)

Do you have a Duke employee discount? A. Yes, Duke employees can receive 10% of the camp base price (does not include extended day, ball, etc). You must ask for the discount code BEFORE registering in order to get the discount. Please email us with your Duke position when requesting the code.

Do you run Girl's camps as well? Our Summer DAY camps for ages 5-12 are co-ed. ID camps for girls 13 and older, are run by the Duke women’s soccer head coach and information can be found at www.dukesoccerschool.com College Recruiting Information Talk This is not an exclusive piece of the camp but an opportunity for rising seniors to talk with the staff about playing college soccer, the recruitment process, application process, and a tour of the campus if wanted. There will be a separate group discussion for those rising seniors interested. Can my son take a tour of the campus during camp? Yes, you will need to sign up with Duke Admissions for a tour. The tours are on specific days and times determined by Duke and if it interferes with training, they must get permission from their camp coach. The link to register for a tour is: https://admissions.duke.edu/visit/ Is the Duke coaching staff visible and involved during camps? A. Yes, the head coach, assistant coach, and keeper coaches are a significant part of the camp and very visible.

B. The assistant coach and keeper coach are coaches at the camp and the head coach is walking around and watching every day. Are there other college coaches at the camp? A. UPDATE: during covid times, only Duke staff and players are allowed to attend the camps. Every year we have coaches from all over including from Division 1, 2, and 3 colleges, big clubs, international, etc.

B. Our Staff page on the website will have a list of coaches as they sign up. What is your tax id number? A. 26-1735391

B. A formal receipt can be sent to you by request. Do we have to turn in our son’s medical form at the time of applying? A. Currently the required forms were filled out when you register online.

C. A physical from earlier camps or sports can be used as long as it is still within the 12 months of our camp.

D. You can email, bring to check-in, or mail the forms. How do I register if I do not live in the United States?
